rooms.description: A spacious entrance hall with a foyer that adheres to Vastu principles, ensuring positive energy flow. Art Deco elements incorporated through geometric patterns and bold colors.
Main living area featuring Art Deco motifs such as chrome finishes and decorative panels. Large windows ensure ample natural light in accordance with Vastu principles.
Elegant dining space with geometric design elements, well-positioned to receive sunlight and maintain auspicious energies per Vastu guidelines.
Modern kitchen with Art Deco accents, designed for efficient workflow. The layout respects Vastu by aligning the cooking area to the east for optimal energy flow.
A guest room with contemporary decor and Art Deco styling, strategically placed on a favorable axis per Vastu principles.
Small dressing area integrated within the bedroom suite for convenience while maintaining aesthetic alignment with Art Deco design.

openings.description: Large, double-car garage door for easy access to a two-car underground/garage area.
Main entrance door with Art Deco design elements, ensuring smooth entry and adherence to Vastu energy flow.
East-facing window for additional light in the living room and kitchen areas, in accordance with Vastu principles.
